definitions: An implement with two or more prongs used for lifting food to the mouth or holding it when cutting.
A farm or garden tool with three or four prongs, used for digging or lifting.
Denoting a light meal or buffet that may be eaten solely with a fork, while standing.
The point where something, especially a road or river, divides into two parts.
Each of a pair of supports in which a bicycle or motorcycle wheel revolves.
A simultaneous attack on two or more pieces by one.
